001package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs;
002
003import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
004
005/**
006 * An exception thrown when an error related to media type handling occurs in the context
007 * of key-value parsing or formatting.
008 *
009 * <p>
010 * This exception is used when a required media type cannot be found or when an issue
011 * arises while processing media types associated with {@link KeyValuesResource}
012 * instances.
013 *
014 * <p>
015 * Example scenarios where this exception might be thrown include:
016 * <ul>
017 * <li>Failing to find a parser for a specified media type</li>
018 * <li>Issues related to media type resolution or handling</li>
019 * </ul>
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * This class extends {@link RuntimeException}, so it does not need to be declared in a
023 * method's {@code throws} clause.
024 */
025public class KeyValuesMediaException extends RuntimeException {
026
027        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
028
029        /**
030         * Constructs a new {@code KeyValuesMediaException} with the specified detail message
031         * and cause.
032         * @param message the detail message, may be {@code null}
033         * @param cause the cause of the exception, may be {@code null}
034         */
035        public KeyValuesMediaException(@Nullable String message, @Nullable Throwable cause) {
036                super(message, cause);
037        }
038
039        /**
040         * Constructs a new {@code KeyValuesMediaException} with the specified detail message.
041         * @param message the detail message, may be {@code null}
042         */
043        public KeyValuesMediaException(@Nullable String message) {
044                super(message);
045        }
046
047}
